attributes.action: GOV TO INCREASE THE PENALTIES WHEN FOUND USING MOBILE PHONE WHILST DRIVING!
attributes.additional_details:
Texting whilst driving needs to be treated with the same vigor as drink driving. If you have issue with this, it’s because you yourself do it. 

If you kill a child who runs out? Give a cyclist life altering injuries or crash into someone who never has the confidence to drive again - all so you can send a friend that funny picture or text meaningless drivel.

Please ask the government to alter how this is reported it must be a public contribution not just the police who can catch the offenders!
attributes.background: How many people do you see driving along texting on their phone. We shouldn’t take this as a “sign of the times” cars have hands free kits now there’s no excuse. In a split second CRASH emotional and physical harm caused even death. Pleading with you to sign this to get it to a parliament debate.
